name: Wall Walker (itch)
description:
This game was created for Kenney Game Jam 2021. All assets are from kenney.nl!!

How to play
  • Walk to left  : Left arrow key or [A] key
  • Walk to right : Right arrow key or [D] key
  • Retry stage : [R] key

When you walk towards a wall or a cliff, the world spins and becomes the ground there.

Get the key and open the door.

Blocks will fall in the direction of gravity.

Be careful not to get stuck in the spikes or get crushed by the blocks.

Good luck!!

Ver0.8.1(31 Aug 2021) Fixed the problem of not rotating. / Add retry key.
